main event: Multiple sightings of UFOs occurred in San Antonio, Texas, on various dates in 1952 and 1953, with reports of elliptical-shaped lighted objects and streaks of light observed by military personnel and civilians.
interesting points: Aircraft reported seeing an elliptical-shaped, lighted object that seemed motionless in the sky over San Antonio, Texas, on 16 June 1953, with no physical evidence or identifiable cause found.

Witnesses reported observing a saucer-shaped object moving back and forth erratically at a high rate of speed, with the object being silent and exhibiting no trail or exhaust. The observation lasted approximately 45 seconds.

An airman at Kelly Air Force Base reported seeing an elliptical-shaped light that appeared suspended in the sky, initially thinking it might be an unidentified flying object before concluding it was the reflection of the sun on a high cirrus cloud.

Observations of unidentified objects were also reported by civilians, with one witness describing the objects as yellow in color, round, and moving at a high altitude, changing speeds at will, and in different directions.

Photographic evidence of a flying disc taken on April 29, 1953, in San Antonio, Texas, was analyzed by photo interpretation personnel, who concluded that the object depicted was not a genuine flying disc but possibly a conventional aircraft, such as an F-86, in normal flight.
sighted object: Elliptical-shaped, lighted objects and streaks of light
